5.eng-name: Establishing the Prayer and the Sunnah Regarding Them

hadiths.text: Yahya bin Abu Ishaq narrated that Anas said:“We went out with the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) from Al-Madinah to Makkah, during which time we shortened our prayer to two Rak’ah, until we came back.” I asked: “How long did he stay in Makkah?” He said: “Ten (days).”

chapter.ara-name: باب كَمْ يَقْصُرُ الصَّلاَةَ الْمُسَافِرُ إِذَا أَقَامَ بِبَلْدَةٍ
chapter.eng-name: For how long may a traveler shorten his Prayer if he stays in a town?
